trans-unit.source: By default, new members are disabled and have to be enabled by an administrator. If you want them to be able to self-activate their account, use this checkbox.
trans-unit.target: By default, new members are disabled and have to be enabled by an administrator. If you want them to be able to self-activate their account, use this checkbox.

trans-unit.source: This notification is sent after a new member confirms their double opt-in link.
trans-unit.target: This notification is sent after a new member confirms their double opt-in link.
